title: Introduction to Regular Expressions
summary: Many developers, including quite a few experienced developers, are absolutely confounded by regular expressions. However, regular expressions aren't as difficult as many believe. In this talk, I will teach regular expressions by starting with the simple and moving toward the complex, so that you too can read and write regular expressions like a hero.
